outline:
1. to become a son-in-law, make oneself a daughter's husband
    1. (Qal) wife's father, wife's mother, father-in-law, mother-in-law (participle)
    2. (Hithpael) to make oneself a daughter's husband
kjv_def: join in affinity, father in law, make marriages, mother in law, son in law.
strongs_def: to give (a daughter) away in marriage; hence (generally) to contract affinity by marriage
